content:
AssetFileOptions AssetFileOptions Enum

In this Article

Edit

Specifies the the different options that an IAssetFile can have.

Syntax

Declaration

[Flags]
public enum AssetFileOptions<Flags>
Public Enum AssetFileOptions

Remarks

This is a flags enum.

Fields

Fragmented
Fragmented

Specifies that the AssetFile is Fragmented.
None
None

Specifies no asset file options.

Attributes

System.FlagsAttribute

Details

Namespace

Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client

Assembly

Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll
